Back: Are you sure you want to do this?
Tilbake: Er du sikker på at du vil gjøre dette?

Back: Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?
Tilbake: Er du sikker på at du vil oppheve brukerens token?

Back: Please correct the password reset token.
Please specify the correct account and try again.
Tilbake: Angi den riktige kontoen og prøv på nytt.

Back: Your password reset link has expired.
Tilbake: Link for å gjenopprette passord er utgått.

Back: We're unable to send the password reset email.
Tilbake: Vi fikk ikke sendt deg e-post for tilbakestilling av passord.

Back: We'll email you a link to reset your password.
Tilbake: Vi vil sende deg en link pr epost for å tilbakestille passordet.

Back: You cannot delete your own account.
Tilbake: Du kan ikke slette din egen konto.

Back: You have entered an invalid password for current user.
Tilbake: Du har angitt et ugyldig passord for gjeldende bruker.

Back: We can't find a user to delete.
Tilbake: Vi finner ikke en bruker for å slette.

Back: You have revoked the user's tokens.
We can't find a user to revoke.
Tilbake: Vi finner ikke en bruker å tilbakekalle.
Du kan ikke slette selv tildelte roller.

Back: An error occurred while deleting this role.
Tilbake: Det oppstod en feil under sletting av denne rollen.

Back: An error occurred while saving this role.
Tilbake: Det oppstod en feil under lagring av denne rollen.

Back: A user with the same user name or email already exists.
Tilbake: Det finnes allerede en bruker med samme navn eller e-post.

Back: Sorry, but this password has already been used. Please create another.
Tilbake: Beklager, men passordet er allerede brukt. Opprett et nytt.

Back: You did not sign in correctly or your account is temporarily disabled.
Tilbake: Du har ikke oppgitt riktig påloggingsinformasjon eller kontoen er midlertidig stengt.

Back: You need more permissions to access this.
Tilbake: Du trenger flere tillatelser for å få tilgang til dette.

Back: User Name is a required field.
First Name is a required field.
Last Name is a required field.

Tilbake: Vennligst skriv inn en gyldig e-post-adresse.

Back: Your password must be at least %1 characters.
Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.
Tilbake: Passordet må inneholde både numeriske og alfabetiske tegn.

Back: Your password confirmation must match your password.
It's time to change your password.
Tilbake: Det er på tide å endre passordet.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Tilbake: Det er på tide å endre passordet.

Back: Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.
Enter your email address.  You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
Tilbake: Angi e-postadressen.  Du vil motta en epost med en link for å tilbakestille passordet.

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?
Tilbake: Advarsel! \r\n Denne handlingen vil fjerne brukeren fra allerede tildelte rolle\r\n Er du sikker?

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?
Tilbake: Advarsel! \r\n Denne handlingen vil fjerne brukerene fra allerede tildelte rolle\r\n Er du sikker?
Bekreftelse på tilbakestilling av passord for %name

Back: There was recently a request to change the password for your account.
Tilbake: Det var nylig en forespørsel om å endre passordet for din konto.

Back: If you requested this change, reset your password here:
Tilbake: Hvis du forespurte denne endringen, tilbakestill passordet her:

Back: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
Tilbake: Hvis du ikke har sendt denne forespørselen, kan du ignorere denne e-posten og passordet vil forbli det samme som før.

Back: We have received a request to change the following information associated with your account at %store_name: %changes.
Tilbake: Vi har mottatt en forespørsel om å endre følgende informasjon knyttet til kontoen din hos %store_name: %changes.

Back: If you have not authorized this action, please contact us immediately at %store_email
Tilbake: Hvis du ikke har autorisert denne handlingen, vennligst kontakt oss umiddelbart på %store_email

Back: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
Tilbake: E-postmal valgt basert på tema fallback når "Default" alternativet er valgt.

Back: Maximum Login Failures to Lockout Account
Tilbake: Maksimum antall innloggingsfeil for å låse konto

Back: We will disable this feature if the value is empty.
Tilbake: Vi deaktiverer denne funksjonen hvis verdien er tom.

Back: The password for your account has been successfully changed.
If you did not request this change, please contact us.
Tilbake: If you did not request this change, please contact us.

Back: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.
Tilbake: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.

Back: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.
Tilbake: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.

Back: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.
Tilbake: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.

Back: More permissions are needed to access this.
Tilbake: More permissions are needed to access this.

Back: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.
Tilbake: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.

Back: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Tilbake: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.

Back: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Tilbake: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Tilbake: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Tilbake: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
